features: Hidden Phone Tripod Mount with Cold Shoe: The phone tripod comes with a smartphone holder with a cold shoe mount, allows you to mount a microphone or led video light for selfie Vlog
1/4 Thread for Extension: The camera flexible tripod has a 1/4‘ thread, allows you to mount a minotor magic arm(not included)

Wide Compatiblity: There is a universal 1/4 srcew to mount a DSLR camera, sony canon nikon; the range size of phone holder is from 65-95mm, compatible with iphone 12/11/11 pro/11 pro max/xs/xs max/8 plus/Samsung note 10/galaxy s10 and more mobile devices
Vertical and Horizontal Shooting: The ball head allows the smartphone clip 180° rotation, no matter phone or camera, support veritical and horizontal shooting
Camera Flexible Tripod: The octopus camera tripod can be used as a tripod or selfie stick, the phone tripod can wrap on lampposts, fence posts, tree limbs, chairs, doorknobs etc

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Versatility and Stability - The ULANZI Camera Tripod Delivers Excellence
reviews.reviewText: My photography and video work would not be possible without the ULANZI Camera Tripod. This tripod has given me newfound freedom in my artistic expression thanks to its adaptability, steadiness, and cutting-edge construction.The extraordinary adaptability of this tripod is its defining characteristic. The flexible legs allow me to twist and contort them into any position I need to get the best photo possible. The tripod is perfect for a variety of uses because it easily conforms to my artistic vision, whether I'm taking photos or filming movies.When it comes to content creators who use both cameras and smartphones, the disguised phone holder with a cold shoe mount is a game-changer. By placing my phone atop this innovative accessory, I am able to take photos from a variety of angles and easily swap between devices. Having a cold shoe mount means I can add a microphone or LED light to improve the quality of my videos.This tripod has a lot going for it, not the least of which is its compatibility with 1/4-inch screws. It works flawlessly with a wide range of camera makes and models, as well as magic arms and other accessories. Because of its adaptability, the tripod will always be one of my go-to pieces of gear.In addition to my iPhone 13 and Canon camera, I've also used the ULANZI Camera Tripod with a small camcorder. The design is flexible enough to fit a variety of gadgets, and the firm hold prevents my gear from jiggling around.The tripod's small stature and low weight make it a convenient travel companion. The lightweight design of the tripod makes it ideal for portability, so I can take use of it no matter where my photography or filmmaking takes me.Due to its user-friendly layout, assembly and installation need minimal effort. Thanks to the camera's user-friendly interface and simple controls, I can spend less time fussing with the settings and more time composing the perfect photo.The ULANZI Camera Tripod provides solid support. The strong build and comfortable grip give my camera a stable platform, allowing me to take steady shots without shaking or losing focus.In conclusion, the ULANZI Camera Tripod is an exceptional piece of equipment. Its adaptability, concealed phone holder with cold shoe mount, and widespread compatibility make it an indispensable tool for videographers, photographers, and other media professionals. This tripod provides me with outstanding stability, versatility, and simplicity, whether I'm using my smartphone or my dedicated camera. For its exceptional functionality and cutting-edge design, it unquestionably merits a perfect score of five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Quality and Versatility - ULANZI Camera Tripod
reviews.reviewText: The ULANZI Camera Tripod has exceeded my expectations in terms of both build and functionality. Right off the bat, I was impressed by its high-quality construction. It's evident that great care and detail went into making this product.The bendable legs are a standout feature. They not only offer unparalleled flexibility but also serve as a perfect grip for a wide array of objects, from strollers and cribs to numerous other surfaces. Additionally, these legs can be adjusted to function as a handy grip, providing an easy and comfortable handheld option for my on-the-go shooting needs.Most importantly, it accommodates my iPhone 14 Pro Max flawlessly. The secure fitment ensured that I never once feared my phone would fall out. The secure hold puts any worries about device safety at ease, allowing me to focus solely on capturing the best shots.Overall, I highly recommend the ULANZI Camera Tripod. Whether you're a casual user or a photography enthusiast, you'll appreciate the quality, flexibility, and reliability that this tripod offers. It's not just a tripod; it's a game-changer in mobile photography.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great tripod for video recording
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Like that is compact to store in a backpack and love the flexible legs! Its very sturdy so it doesn’t feel cheap. I struggle to get the actual phone holder opened lol but eventually got it. I do wish it would come with it’s own storage bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This feels like a real upgrade from the flexible tripod I had before without even costing that much more money.One problem with my old tripod is that it didn't have a plate to stabilize my webcam. You just screwed the webcam into the part connected to the ball mechanism and it didn't feel very stable. Plus you couldn't get it tight because once it's screwed on all the way the ball just spins.This one gets around that problem where the mounting bolt is attached to a plate that has its own dial to tighten it. Much more stable. And I love that the plate can be popped open to convert into a cellphone holder.Overall very impressed with this product. Tremendous value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All in one mini tripod
reviews.reviewText: Nicely designed little tripod. It’s sturdy and well balanced in any configuration. Flex arms stay put when bent. Phone adapter folds away for a nice platform. May be a bit heavy for backpacking, but perfect to have in a car or camera bag.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value is good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to setup, works like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good tripod. I recommend it.
INCREIBLE PRODUCTO CALIDAD Y PRECIO SUPER RECOMENDABLE

For the price this tripod is great quality and a nice design. I think the head is clever and versatile. The only issue is that the head can come loose from the legs fairly easily, a bit of rubber padding between the two would help it stay tight (it is just metal against metal).I think the legs are better than a Gorrilapod for long term durability (no troublsome joints that can become loose), although they cannot bend and grip quite like a Gorillapod. At first I was a bit disappointed that it didn't seems capable of grabbing onto posts/railings/branches very strongly, but then I learned that you can use a lot of force when wrapping it around things and then it can grab quite well. I just wouldn't say that it can support an SLR camera on a round horizontal bar, it will flop over under such weight without anything else to stabilize the legs. A possible improvement to the design (for those who want to use it for grabbing onto things) would be to cover the legs in big rubber rings, similar to a Gorillapod's legs.

Esse tripé de cara dá pra perceber que é muito mais resistente que os articulados que tem bolinhas nos pés.Além disso ele é muito compacto e o encaixe pra celular já vem nele.Achei muito bom mesmo. Sempre carregando comigo.

reviews.reviewTitle: At this price range it is best tripod
reviews.reviewText: The ULANZI Camera Tripod literally enhanced my photography and videography experiences. After using it for one month, now I can easily enumerate why you should buy it:1. It is compact, portable, and lightweight, so easily to carry on outdoor shoots or when traveling.2. Its sturdy build quality enables it to hold the weight of various cameras and accessories without wobbling.3. It offers flexible height adjustment with its extendable legs and center column to capture shots from various angles.4. Its pan and tilt functionality enables you to capture smooth and controlled camera movements.5. It looks premium and at this price range, it was worth purchasing for any newbie photographer.
